Articles.Content: :cool:thank you devs for fixing it. awesomeness.
Yes this is great, thanks devs!
Yeah, glad to see every thing's back up and running again

It is a bit sad so much was lost.

We must rebuild!

(Especially those awesome physics breaking threads involving helicopters and monorails and other such things.)
agh im back, no long have such a early join date D:
Thank you devs! I almost fainted when I refreshed the page a moment ago and saw they were back up!
yeah, for me its the fact that my new account doesn't have rights to do anything because my post count is 0

Yay.

Shame about the account wiping, but a fresh start is always nice. I feel like I've traveled back in time.
Huzzah for the forums!!! Huzzah for the devs!!! Huzzahs all around!!!
Yay back to the forums, to bad the forum was reverted to October 19th
I'm glad we are running again and happy my account is still here and kind of sad to newbies who lost there account but at least the bugs are gone hopefully

Huzzah! Also for everyone rejoining you are great. i myself would be upset if my account was lost, it cant be to fun. Think of this moment of being after the zombie Apocalypse, shall we call it something? Kraken apocalypse? Kraken reborn?
Thank the Kerbal Deities (Squad)
Good to see em back up.
Glad to be back, lost a lot of post hehe. However, we can rebuild we have the struts!
Had to freakin remake my profile >.< Why did I have to do that?!
The entire forum is made of necro threads! zombie forum! ZOMBIES!
This moderated posts thing is a little annoying...

Had to freakin remake my profile >.< Why did I have to do that?!

Accounts created after October are not present, so those ones will need to be remade.

This moderated posts thing is a little annoying...

It is being worked on.

Profiles needed to be remade, and for some moderated posts returned, due to the loss of large amounts of data on the KSP forum servers which resulted in the majority of the forums going back to around October of 2012. We're sorry for the inconvenience and doing our best to get everything back in working order. However in my understanding, the data has been lost permanently.
I was planning on making a new thread for my spacecrafts; didn't have to anymore.
I'm not unsympathetic about the whole ordeal, and I know the moderation and profile issues can't really be fixed easilly, and I am grateful to the devs for doing what they can.
Well, I'm also glad the forums are back up, but it's too bad how much we lost.

It's a bit upsetting that we lost so much; most of the general discussion threads I could do without, but the mod-specific stuff was actually valuable, and of course the screenshot threads were important. And remaking my account sucked a bit.

But at least we're back.
oh dear, the mods are going to be driven insane aproveing all the "old- but now new again- users" first 5 posts.
